doctor.name: Dr. Muhammad Masud Rana
doctor.info: Dr. Muhammad Masud Rana is a highly qualified Gastroenterology, Liver, Medicine, and Diabetes specialist based in Kushtia. He holds an MBBS from Dhaka Medical College, along with a BCS (Health) and an MD in Gastroenterology. Additionally, he has received a MACP from the USA and undergone special postgraduate training in Endocrinology. As a Consultant in Gastroenterology at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital, Dr. Masud Rana provides expert care for conditions such as acid reflux, peptic ulcers, fatty liver disease, hepatitis, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), cirrhosis, and diabetes-related complications. Patients can consult him at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia, located at Sono Tower, College Mor, Court Para, Kushtia. His visiting hours are from 4 PM to 8 PM (closed on Tuesdays).

chamber.address: Sono Tower, College Mor, Court Para, Kushtia

doctor.name: Dr. ATM Ataur Rahman (Hiron)
doctor.specialty: Gastroenterology (Stomach, Liver, Intestine, Gallbladder) & Medicine Specialist
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical College, Faridpur
doctor.info: Dr. ATM Ataur Rahman (Hiron) is a Gastroenterologist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine, FP), MD (Gastroenterology). He is a Associate Professor, Gastroenterology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical College, Faridpur. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. ATM Ataur Rahman (Hiron) at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia is 10am to 6pm (Friday), 3pm to 7pm (Saturday).

chamber.address: City Tower, House # 01, Mir Mosharraf Hossain Road, Coart Para, Kushtia

doctor.name: Dr. S.M. Khosruzzaman (Mukul)
doctor.info: Dr. S.M. Khosruzzaman (Mukul) is a Gastroenterologist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Gastroenterology). He is a Assistant Professor, Gastroenterology at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Amin Diagnostic & Medical Services, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. S.M. Khosruzzaman (Mukul) at Amin Diagnostic & Medical Services, Kushtia is 6pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Ram Chandra Ray Chowdhury Road, College Mor, Court Para, Kushtia

doctor.name: Dr. Taisir Shahriar
doctor.info: Dr. Taisir Shahriar is a Gastroenterologist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Gastroenterology). He is a Consultant, Gastroenterology at Sono Hospital Limited, Kushtia. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Taisir Shahriar at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia is 9am to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Sono Tower, College Mor, Court Para, Kushtia
